CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Thanks to the many attempts that have been made to develop NIR absorbing polymers , a notable improvement of the overall power - conversion efficiency ( PCE ) has been achieved.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. NIR absorbing polymers

Explanation: NIR stands for Near-Infrared, which refers to a specific range of electromagnetic radiation with wavelengths between 700 and 1000 nanometers. The term "NIR absorbing polymers" refers to a type of material that is capable of absorbing light in this range of the electromagnetic spectrum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph:

1. NIR absorbing polymers

Explanation: This term refers to a specific type of material that is capable of absorbing light in the near-infrared range of the electromagnetic spectrum.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NIR absorbing polymers |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Thanks to the many attempts that have been made to develop NIR absorbing polymers , a notable improvement of the overall power - conversion efficiency ( PCE ) has been achieved.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. NIR (Near-Infrared)
2. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties:

1. NIR (Near-Infrared) - a property of materials that refers to the range of wavelengths in the electromagnetic spectrum that are absorbed by the material.
2. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) - a material property that refers to the efficiency of converting energy from one form to another, in this case, the efficiency of converting light into electrical energy.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| NIR (Near-Infrared) |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
